origin.slimesurvival.creeper.name: Creeper
power.slimesurvival.creeper/creeping.des: While you are, hopefully, an evolved member of your species, you still hold an innate primal creeper "mode".
power.slimesurvival.creeper/creeping/hun: You exhaust §n0.75§r hunger for every second in §lCreeping Mode§r.
origin.slimesurvival.ghoul.name: Ghoul
origin.slimesurvival.ghoul.description: You don't remember much of your past life, except for an everlasting hunger for flesh...
power.slimesurvival.ghoul/undead.name: Undead Monster
power.slimesurvival.ghoul/undead.descrip:
Due to no longer being alive, you exhibit properties analogous to the undead.
§d- Immune to poison and regeneration.
§d- Instant health and instant damage are inverted.
§c- Silver and smite do more damage against you.
§a- You cannot drown.
power.slimesurvival.ghoul/flesh_eater.de: You can only eat rotten flesh
power.slimesurvival.ghoul/burn_in_daylig: Your skin is rotten. It burns easily, especially in sunlight, and gives off a sickly green appearance.
item.slimesurvival.polar_bear_fur.toolti: §7• Can be found in medium quantities on polar bears
§7• Essential material for winter clothing and medical dressings
item.slimesurvival.axolotl_gills.tooltip: §7• Rare drop from axolotls and "fish" fishing
§7• Potent regenerative abilities that can be used in armor and medicine
item.slimesurvival.mystite_ingot.details:
§7Highly durable and strong, this metal won't
§7falter unless submerged in water.
item.slimesurvival.mystite_tool_rod.deta: §7A reinforced stick used for the crafting of stronger tools and weapons.
item.slimesurvival.mystite_ore.details:
§7Contains slight traces of redstone
§7and an unknown metal.

§7Resistant to high temperatures; can
§7only be smelted in a blast furnace.
item.slimesurvival.mystite_ore.how_to_ob:
§7Rarely found in deepslate redstone ore
§7when using a §lMystite Pickaxe§r§7.
item.slimesurvival.enderium_alloy.detail: §7May have some applications as an ingredient
item.slimesurvival.rift_battleaxe.detail: §7A heavy weapon that swings slow but hits §lreally§r§7 hard.
§7Right clicking will push away nearby mobs and players at the
§7cost of a short movement speed penalty afterwards with cooldown.
item.slimesurvival.ban_hammer.detail[0]: §7It unleashes an ungodly amount of energy at whomever it hits.
item.slimesurvival.winter_coat.detail_0: §7Made from polar bear fur, fox hide, and woven thread.
item.slimesurvival.winter_coat.detail_1: §7It provides a moderate amount of insulation.
item.slimesurvival.utility_belt.detail_1: §7Allows for an extra trinket on your belt.
item.slimesurvival.bloodstained_glass.de:
§7§oMedium risk, medium reward

§cOne-shot protection only works half of the time.
item.slimesurvival.reactor_core.details:
§7Emits short doses of radiation that augment cell count rapidly.

§7The short doses of radiation may cause fatigue and, in rare cases, cancer.
§§
